SELECT admission.admission_nm, exam.exam_date, exam.exam_time, examinee.dept_nm, examinee.major_nm, exam_map.virt_no, score.scorer_nm, score.score01, score.score02, score.score03, score.score04, score.score05, score.score06, score.score07, score.score08, score.score09, score.score10, score.total_score, score.score_dttm FROM exam_map INNER JOIN exam ON exam_map.exam_cd = exam.exam_cd INNER JOIN admission ON exam.admission_cd = admission.admission_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON exam_map.examinee_cd = examinee.examinee_cd LEFT JOIN score ON exam_map.exam_cd = score.exam_cd AND exam_map.virt_no = score.virt_no
AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND exam.exam_nm = #{param.examNm} AND exam.exam_date = #{param.examDate} AND exam.exam_time = DATE_FORMAT(#{param.examTime}, '%T') AND examinee.dept_nm = #{param.deptNm} AND examinee.major_nm = #{param.majorNm} AND exam_map.virt_no = #{param.virtNo} score.scorer_nm LIKE '%' #{param.scorerNm} '%'
GROUP BY admission.admission_nm , exam.exam_date , exam.exam_time , examinee.dept_nm , examinee.major_nm , exam_map.virt_no , score.scorer_nm
